about_the_game:
Hyper Pop is a frantic action roguelike bullet heaven. Use your mouse cursor to guide and protect your character as it grows to become absurdly overpowered against hordes of cute emojis!

HELP YOUR EMOJI GROW

Point and click to tell your character 🤬 where to go, avoiding enemies and picking up experience gems to level up. Swipe enemies with your mouse to deal damage and defend your emoji while it's still weak.

EVOLVE YOUR EMOJI'S POWERS

Strategically decide how to develop your character's abilities to turn your helpless emoji into an unstoppable enemy-popping menace!

SURVIVE THE SWARMS

Pit your skills against varied enemy types that will surround, rush, and surprise you and your emoji.


Thank you to a327ex for the artstyle/mouse cursor inspiration and to poncle for the gameplay inspiration. 😍
